column4: Does anybody know why I can't get sound out of an MPEG4 file? It is supposed to have Audio Codec    : AAC 44100Hz stereo 128Kbps. I have tried two ubuntu installations, and Totem, Xine, VLC and MPlayer. The same story everywhere, video is fine, but no audio.
every player plays the movie, but all are silent.
i dont mean to pry, but other sounds work right?
sound is fine when I play other movies.
it might be the file that is corrupted then?
try another one, but doubt it
I only have one file of that type. Yet. :(
so you get no sound with vlc?
with that mp4-file I get no sound in vlc, that is correct.
oh are you sure it has sound?
I'm pretty sure, It's from a TV-program.
try to use faad to convert it
Now I found out that it actually was no sound in that file. :( Sorry for bothering you, and thanks for your help anyway.
